body_html:
@Kaixhin Yeah it is. Those functions operate after the entire gradient has been computed.

That’s fine if the sequence is short but with long sequences the gradient could explode to infinity before it’s clipped.

Here is a reference:
https://discuss.pytorch.org/t/proper-way-to-do-gradient-clipping/191/16?u=michael_petrochuk
